content: explained how the machine could currently only work in the vicinity of the island, and how the clouds around the top were Island Clouds and that the lower area was the residential Fabiriophase. The Straw Hats, except for Zoro and Brook, who remained on ship watch duty, then disembarked and obtained some new clothes. While the two swordsmen had tea on the ship, they released Caribou and told him to disembark, despite his protests as the island was a government island.
